name: airline_delay_avg_cloudant_cloudant_airport
command: export SPARK_JOB_LOCATION='python/DelayAvg_Cloudant.py YOUR_CLOUDANT_HOST YOUR_CLOUDANT_USER YOUR_CLOUDANT_APIKEY airline_delays_mca airport airline_delays_mca_airport' && export SPARK_DRIVER_HOST=$(ip addr show eth1 | awk '/inet / {print $2}' | cut -d/ -f1) && export SPARK_CORES_MAX=2 && export SPARK_ADDITIONAL_CONFIG='--conf spark.ui.port=4059' && export SPARK_MASTER=YOUR_MESOS_MASTER && ./run.sh
